concept.title: DITA pre-processing architecture
concept.shortdesc: This document describes the different steps in preprocessing for DITA topics.

conbody.p: The DITA Open Toolkit implements a two-pass, map-driven architecture that resolves any conditional properties and content references on the first pass, then applies transformations to the normalized files on the second pass. The stages of this pre-processing pipeline are described below.

section.title: genlist: generate list files of map and topic
section.p: Pass the files and generate list files that may be needed by other activity.(Implemented by ANT extension with Java.)

section.title: filtering:
section.p: Filter the source files according to the input .ditaval file. Based on the specified action, either flag or exclude the content according to the %select-atts. (Implemented by ANT extension with Java.)

section.title: insert debug information (merged into filtering):
section.p: Add @xtrf and @xtrc attribute with proper values into each element.(Implemented by ANT extension with Java.)

p.i: The output of this step is directed to a temp directory.

section.title: adjust column names of table (merged into conref resolve activity):
section.p: Adjust all of the column names of the tables to "col1, col2, col3 ..." to enable conref between tables.(Implemented by ANT extension with Java.)

p.i: The colname attribute is adjusted in the content that was conrefed during the process of resolving conref.

section.title: move index entries:
section.p: Move the index entries contained in the <topicmeta> tag into the relevant topics referred to in the ditamap.(Implemented by ANT extension with Java.)

section.title: resolve conref:
section.p: Pass all the files which used conref and resolve the conref.(Implemented by XSL-T)

section.title: mappull:
section.p: Pull the navtitle and topicmeta from topics to ditamap(Implemented by XSL-T)

section.title: topicpull:
section.p: Pull metadata for <link> and <xref> element(Implemented by XSL-T)

section.title: maplink:
section.p: Find and generate related link information into maplinks.unordered for every topic referred to in the ditamap (Implemented by XSL-T)

section.title: movelink:
section.p: Move the related link information from the maplinks.unordered to every topic (Implemented in ANT extension with Java)
